original_title: Current government is the most corrupt – Nalaka Godahewa
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former Sri Lankan Minister Dr. Nalaka Godahewa has slammed the present Sri Lankan Government for being the most corrupt in recent history.
He said that the government has completely disrgarded the due process in procurement, and is awarding contracts to suppliers as per their own wishes.
"What is happening today is that they have disregarded the due process on procurement and are awarding contracts to their preferred suppliers via the cabinet," he said.
Uma Oya Unit 1 ready by August 2023 for electricity generation – Farab
